org.bitcoinj.core.listeners

Interface BlockChainListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NewBestBlockListener, ReorganizeListener, TransactionReceivedInBlockListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBlockChainListener
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface BlockChainListener
extends NewBestBlockListener, TransactionReceivedInBlockListener, ReorganizeListener
    Old interface for backwards compatibility. Implement the more specific interfaces instead.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bitcoinj.core.listeners.NewBestBlockListener

        notifyNewBestBlock

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bitcoinj.core.listeners.TransactionReceivedInBlockListener

        notifyTransactionIsInBlock, receiveFromBlock

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bitcoinj.core.listeners.ReorganizeListener
